general.loadingFailed: Loading failed, please check your internet connection
general.loadingFailedSubtitle: Please check your internet connection and try again

mod.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this mod?

header.updateNotNeeded: The installed version is identical to the latest version

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.loadingFailed: Failed to load changelog. <0>Click here</0> to view it on GitHub.

debugLogging.title: Debug logging
debugLogging.description: Can be useful for troubleshooting issues with the mod.

modSettings.title: Mod settings
modSettings.description: Easily export or share your mod settings.

customList.descriptionInclusion: A custom list of additional executable file names/paths that the mod will target. The list is added to the inclusion list that the mod author defined to determine which processes to target. For each process, the mod is loaded if the executable file path matches one of the include entries and doesn't match any exclude entry.
customList.descriptionExclusion: A custom list of additional executable file names/paths that the mod will excluded from targeting. The list is added to the exclusion list that the mod author defined to determine which processes to target. For each process, the mod is loaded if the executable file path matches one of the include entries and doesn't match any exclude entry.
customList.processListPlaceholder: Process names/paths, one per line, for example:

includeExcludeCustomOnly.title: Ignore mod inclusion/exclusion lists
includeExcludeCustomOnly.description: Ignore the mod's process inclusion/exclusion lists and use only the custom lists above.

changes.title: Latest Version Changes
changes.noData: The installed version is identical to the latest version.

featuredMods.title: Featured Mods
featuredMods.noMods: There are no featured mods that weren't installed yet

language.title: Language
language.description: Select your preferred display language for Windhawk.

updates.title: Check for updates
updates.description: Periodically check for new versions of Windhawk and of the installed mods.

devMode.title: Developer mode
devMode.description: Show actions for developers, such as creating and modifying mods.

hideTrayIcon.title: Hide tray icon
hideTrayIcon.description: You will have to disable this option to exit Windhawk.

requireElevation.title: Require UAC elevation for running Windhawk
requireElevation.description: Windhawk requires administrator rights, but for a single-user computer, getting the UAC prompt every time can be annoying, so Windhawk bypasses it. Enable this option to require UAC elevation for running Windhawk.

dontAutoShowToolkit.title: Don't automatically show the toolkit dialog
dontAutoShowToolkit.description: By default, Windhawk automatically shows the toolkit dialog when it detects that the taskbar isn't accessible, either due to system instability or for another reason. The toolkit dialog allows to exit Windhawk, switch to safe mode, and make other operations. The toolkit dialog can also be shown with the Ctrl+Win+W keyboard shortcut.

modInitDialogDelay.title: Mod initialization dialog delay
modInitDialogDelay.description: Amount of milliseconds to wait before showing progress dialog for mod initialization.

moreAdvancedSettings.title: More advanced settings
moreAdvancedSettings.restartNotice: Windhawk will be restarted to apply the settings.

loggingVerbosity.description: Logs can be viewed with a tool such as DebugView.

processList.descriptionExclusion: A list of process names/paths that Windhawk won't inject into. Can be useful for cases when Windhawk isn't compatible with a specific program. Note that adding a process to this list will not only prevent Windhawk from customizing it, but will also prevent Windhawk from intercepting child processes that this process creates. This will cause Windhawk to load mods with a slight delay in such cases.
processList.exclusionCriticalProcessesNotice: The special <0>{{critical_system_processes}}</0> value can be added to the list to exclude critical system processes. Beware of removing it, as crashing one of these processes might lead to a BSOD.
processList.descriptionInclusion: A list of process names/paths that Windhawk will inject into, even if they're in the exclusion list.
processList.inclusionWithoutExclusionNotice: The process inclusion list has no effect with an empty process exclusion list.
processList.inclusionWithoutTotalExclusionNotice: If you meant to exclude all processes but these, you can set "*" in the process exclusion list.
processList.processListPlaceholder: Process names/paths, one per line, for example:

loadModsInCriticalSystemProcesses.title: Load mods in critical system processes
loadModsInCriticalSystemProcesses.description: By default, Windhawk only loads mods in critical system processes if the process is targeted explicitly, i.e. is listed without wildcards in the mod's process inclusion list.
loadModsInCriticalSystemProcesses.always: If targeted explicitly or implicitly (not recommended)

about.title: Windhawk v{{version}}
about.subtitle: The customization marketplace for Windows and programs

update.title: An update is available
update.subtitle: Consider updating Windhawk to get the latest features and bug fixes

builtWith.title: Built with
builtWith.vscodium: A community-driven distribution of Microsoft's VSCode editor
builtWith.minHook: The minimalistic API hooking library for Windows
builtWith.others: Other tools and libraries, and a bit of code

installModal.title: Install {{mod}}
installModal.warningDescription: Malicious mods can damage your computer or violate your privacy. Install mods only from authors whom you trust.
installModal.verifiedTooltip: We verified that this profile belongs to the mod author, but note that <0>verified</0> is not the same as <0>trusted</0>. Make sure you trust the mod author, or carefully inspect the source code before installing.

devModeAction.message: Creating and modifying mods requires some knowledge of C/C++ development for Windows. If you're not sure what that means, perhaps these options are not for you.

safeMode.alert: Windhawk is running in safe mode, all code injection functionality is turned off.
safeMode.offConfirm: Windhawk will be restarted to apply the settings.

modPreview.actionUnavailable: Action is not available in preview mode
modPreview.notCompiled: Mod needs to be compiled before it can be previewed

sidebar.exitConfirmation: Changes since the last successful compilation will be lost
